About HostXNow

For more information, please visit: https://www.hostxnow.com/about-us

Currently, our SSD Hosting plans can be purchased from our excellent server location hosted in London, UK datacentre.

In short, HostXNow's infrastructure helps your sites achieve the best page loading speeds due to our highly optimized unique SSD Hosting platform.

SSD HOSTING FEATURES

Below is a list of some of the extras we include with your SSD Hosting account:

  • Free Daily Offsite Backups w/ 7 days of snapshots + Weekly & Monthly Offsite Backups backed up by StorageSpider!

  • 99.9% Uptime Promise
  • 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

  • 24x7 Helpdesk/Live Chat Support

Click to expand...
MORE SERVER RESOURCES

We offer far more server resources compared to other providers so that your websites will have much more stability and better performance when hosting your websites with us! We do not need to use fancy names for our plans such as "Premium", "Enterprise", "Semi-Dedicated" or "Turbo" to charge you more money. You can have the same resources (if not more) using our Managed WordPress Hosting plans.

It doesn't matter what fancy name a provider gives a plan; it mostly comes down to what CloudLinux settings a provider use and the number of resources the provider allows you to use. We offer more server resources at more affordable pricing. We provide up to 4 Full CPUs, 4 GB of RAM and a massive 60 MBPS IO (the majority of providers only offer 1-2 MBPS IO). Try us, and you won't be disappointed! We also provide better limits for other resources too, so be sure to compare plans in detail. Should you not be happy with our service, we'll provide you with a full refund. If you'd like more information about anything, please contact us over live chat or send us an email.

•••••••••• Why Choose HostXNow? ••••••••••

• True business grade services at an affordable price
• Over 9 years in Business
• 99.9% Uptime guarantee with a proven track record
• True 24x7x365 tech support by live chat, email and tickets
• Daily & Weekly backups (Web/Reseller) + Custom backup available for VPS/Cloud VPS Servers
• We are not a reseller and have full root access to our servers
• We use 6 of the best datacenters in the world to provide the best connectivity to the following continents: Asia, Africa, America, Europe/UK and Australia

Are you tired of empty promises?

Your customers will not wait for your site to load and they will not come back later when your server is not busy. Unlike our competitors, we do not offer the world for pennies and we do not cram as many accounts as possible onto a single server. In the hosting industry, you generally get what you pay for and we offer a premium service to businesses and individuals that require the most reliable hosting to serve their customers. When we make you a promise, we keep it.
